long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Helper script for making browsing webcatalog.circle.ms more convenient.

Features:

お気に入り
* Add author cell next to circle name, and let genre cell width be auto.

お気に入り：　メモ
* Automatically turn URLs in memos into hyperlinks.
* Click anywhere in memo cell to start editing, auto focus memo input when visible.
* "Enter" or "Control+S" to save memo, "Escape" to revert to last saved memo.

ソーシャル
* Change the Pixiv, Twitter, Niconico, and MyHome icons to be hyperlinks to their actual URL, instead of going to circle info.

Github: https://github.com/math4origami/webcatalog-helper
Creator contact: https://twitter.com/math4origami

This extension is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. I am not responsible for any data loss this extension may cause.
